FDA Table 8: All Individual Patient Deaths, Safety Population, Pooled Analyses

Source: R/fda-table_08.R
make_table_08.Rd

FDA Table 8: All Individual Patient Deaths, Safety Population, Pooled Analyses

make_table_08(
  adae,
  adex,
  arm_var = "ARM",
  dth_vars = c("DTHCAUS", "DTHCAT"),
  lbl_dth_vars = c("Cause of Death\nMedDRA\nPreferred Term",
    "Cause of Death\nVerbatim Term"),
  na_level = "NA",
  annotations = NULL
)

Arguments

adae

(data.frame)
dataset (typically ADAE) required to build table.

adex

(data.frame)
dataset (typically ADEX) required to build table.

arm_var

(character)
arm variable used to split table into columns.

dth_vars

(vector of character)
additional death variables from adae to include in the table.

lbl_dth_vars

(vector of character)
labels corresponding to variables in dth_vars to print in the table. Labels should be ordered according to the order of variables in dth_vars.

na_level

(character)
string to represent missing values.

annotations

(named list of character)
list of annotations to add to the table. Valid annotation types are title, subtitles, main_footer, and prov_footer. Each name-value pair should use the annotation type as name and the desired string as value.

Details

  • adae must contain SAFFL, USUBJID, AGE, SEX, AESDTH, DTHADY, and the variables specified by dth_vars and arm_var.

  • adex must contain SAFFL, USUBJID, PARAMCD, TRTSDT, TRTEDT, AVAL, and AVALU.

  • Flag variables (i.e. XXXFL) are expected to have two levels: "Y" (true) and "N" (false). Missing values in flag variables are treated as "N".

Examples

adae <- scda::synthetic_cdisc_dataset("rcd_2022_10_13", "adae")
adex <- scda::synthetic_cdisc_dataset("rcd_2022_10_13", "adex")

tbl <- make_table_08(adae = adae, adex = adex)
head(tbl, 20)
#>                                                         Dosing    Study      Cause of Death                         
#>                                      Age/              Duration   Day of         MedDRA            Cause of Death
